SqlMap.name: TbDrugDataSqlProvider
SqlMap.select: select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by CR_DATE desc ) as rowId , #{tableColumn} from TB_DRUGS left join TB_COMMON_CODE on TB_DRUGS.DRUGS_LEVEL = TB_COMMON_CODE.COMM_CODE and TB_COMMON_CODE.COMM_TYPE= 'DGLV' #{whereString}
select DRUGS_CODE from TB_DRUGS where DRUGS_CODE = @DRUGS_CODE
SqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DRUGS (DRUGS_LEVEL, DRUGS_NAME, DRUGS_CODE, DRUGS_VALUE, CR_DATE) VALUES (@DRUGS_LEVEL, @DRUGS_NAME, @DRUGS_CODE, (select max(DRUGS_VALUE)+1 from TB_DRUGS where DRUGS_LEVEL = @DRUGS_LEVEL), getDATE());
SqlMap.update: update TB_DRUGS set DRUGS_CODE = @DRUGS_CODE , CR_DATE = getdate(), DRUGS_LEVEL = @DRUGS_LEVEL , DRUGS_NAME = @DRUGS_NAME where DRUGS_SNO = @DRUGS_SNO
